name: Salmon Quest
description:
FIRST OF ALL: All music credit goes to Pilotredsun

this game was released for the marathon game jam hosted by practicalnpc on itch.io.

i can't really describe it as anything other than a whacky salmon adventure...

the living conditions in fishland are deteriorating, and you've had enough of it! the water tastes funny, the cable tv connection just cut out, and the fish in fishland are going wild!

features:

-rpg battles

-fishes

-squids

-crazy storyline

-quirky characters

-robbers

salmon quest is best played if you take your time with it, and explore the world.

play it without any apps running in the background for max performance.

i cant discuss any further or i would spoil the storyline. - now go play it!

P.S. you don't have to donate to download it, but you can if you want to.
